briefTitle: A Study Comparing Xalacom And Xalatan In Patients With Primary Open Angle Glaucoma (POAG) Or Ocular Hypertension (OH).

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Intraocular pressure is 18 mmHg or more at baseline after treatment with Xalatan for 4 weeks or more.

Exclusion Criteria:

* History of no-response to timolol
* History of trabeculectomy
* History of other ocular surgery including ALT, SLT,and trabeculotomy within 6 months

outcomeMeasures.title: Change of Intraocular Pressure (IOP) From Baseline to Week 8
outcomeMeasures.description: Value at Week 8 minus value at baseline

outcomeMeasures.title: Change of IOP From Baseline to Week 4
outcomeMeasures.description: Value at Week 4 minus value at baseline

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Subjects With an IOP of <=15 mmHg at Week 8
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of subjects who achieved IOP reduction to 15 mmHg or below at Week 8

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Subjects With an IOP of <=16 mmHg at Week 8
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of subjects who achieved IOP reduction to 16 mmHg or below at Week 8

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change of IOP From Baseline to Week 8
outcomeMeasures.description: Value at Week 8 minus value at baseline was divided by baseline value, then multiplied by 100

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Subjects With an IOP of <=18 mmHg at Week 8
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of subjects who achieved IOP reduction to 18 mmHg or below at Week 8

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Subjects With an IOP Reduction of >=2 mmHg From Baseline to Week 8
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of subjects whose IOP were reduced by 2 mmHg or more at Week 8 from baseline

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Subjects With an IOP Reduction of >=3 mmHg From Baseline to Week 8
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of subjects whose IOP were reduced by 3 mmHg or more at Week 8 from baseline

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Subjects With an IOP of <=17 mmHg at Week 8
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of subjects who achieved IOP reduction to 17 mmHg or below at Week 8
